âš ï¸ **This type is _unstable_ and may change significantly in a way that the data won't be backwards compatible.**
WGSL shader source code for custom rendering.

This component holds inline WGSL shader source that replaces the default
fragment shader when attached to a mesh archetype. The shader's fragment
entry point must be named `fs_main`.

## Rerun datatype
[`Utf8`](../datatypes/utf8.md)


## Arrow datatype
```
utf8
```
